name: Advanced Seller Onboarding
headline: Improved Marketplace Seller Selection and Registration
overview: The app improves seller onboarding through a multistep process that allows the sending of a configurable signup form, the filtration of potential sellers, as well as the acceptance of the marketplace’s terms & conditions. The app allows for quick category synchronization between the marketplace and the seller, as well as the validation of fiscal data. Advanced Seller Onboarding also includes the Seller Link app, an app that displays a static seller page block.
features: Allows the sending of a configurable onboarding form
Allows the filtration of potential marketplace sellers
Displays seller onboarding status in real-time.
Includes a terms & conditions acceptance form.
Includes a static seller page block.
additionalInformation: The app will work with any external sellers, as long as the marketplace is on VTEX.
